oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "The Home Light for Him," poem by Frank L. Stanton

oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Marriage; Poetry
York, Alvin Cullum, 1887-1964; York, Gracie Loretta Williams, 1900-1984; Stanton, Frank Lebby, 1857-1927; Marriage -- Poetry
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The poem, published in the Atlanta Constitution, is subtitled "A Song of Love's Triumph Over Sergeant Alvin York." The author is Frank L. Stanton.
From 1889 until his death in 1927, Frank Lebby Stanton was editorial writer for the Atlanta Constitution. He was named Poet Laureate of Georgia in 1925.
